title: Ennamo Yeadho Edho lyrics Ko Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ennamo Yeadho
Singer: Aalaap Raju, Prashanthini, Rap Sricharan, Emcee Jesz
Lyrics: Sricharan, Emcee Jesz, Karky

Yeah.. Say what...
Ennamo edho,Ennam thiraluthu kanavil
vannam thiraluthu ninaivil, Kangal iruludhu nanavil
Ennamo edho, mutti mulaikkudhu manadhil
Vetti erindhidum nodiyil,Mottu avizhuthu kodiyil

Eno kuviyamilla kuviyamilla oru katchi pedai..
oh ohh..uruvamilla uruvamilla naalai,
Eno kuviyamilla kuviyamilla oru katchi pedai..
oh ohh.. araimanadhaai vidiyithu en kaalai.

Ennamo edho, minnimarayidhu vizhiyil
andhi agaludhu vazhiyil, sindhi sidharudhu veliyil..
Ennamo edho,sikki thavikkudhu manadhil
rekkai virikkudhu kanavil, Vittu parakkudhu thozhaivil

Eno kuviyamilla kuviyamilla ... (repeated as above)
Neeyum naanum endhirama, yaaro seiyum mandhirama, poove..

Muthamitta moochu kaatril, pattu pattu kettu ponen,
pakkam vanthu irkum podhu, thittamittu etti ponen..
Nerungadhe penne endhan nenjellam nanjaagum,
azhaikadhe penne endhan achangal achagum.
Sirippaal ennai nee sidhaithaai podhum…

(starting lines repeated)
Aedho .... Enamo aedho… ..Mottu avizhuthu kodiyil..
Neeyum naanum endhirama, yaaro seiyum mandhirama, poove

Let’s go.. wow.. wow..ungalin thamizhachi..
enamo edho you’re looking too black, 
marakka mudiyalaye en manam andru..
 Un manaso lovely, ippadiye ippo un arugil vanthu seravaa indru.
 
[lady looking like a cindrella cindrella, naughty look-u vita thendral-a..
lady looking like a cindrella cindrella, ennai vattam idum vennila..] (2)

suthi suthi unnai thedi, vizhigal alayum avasaam eno..
satha satha nerisalil un sol satham ariyum adhisayam eno..
Kanakaana thaane penne kan kondhe vantheno…
vina kaana vidayum kaana kanneerum kondeno
nizhalai thirudum mazhalai naano.....!!
